text: Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, Juda binɨb tap kɨli nan gep ñɨn ak. Tol Juda añɨŋ lep ñɨn awl anɨb ak, ñɨn awl yɨbɨl kɨli ownɨgab anɨb ak nɨm, chɨp okok mab bak alaŋ ma yonɨmuŋ agɨl nɨgɨlak. Anɨgɨl nɨŋɨd, am Paylat nop agnɨŋɨd agɨlak, Bɨ mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lɨpal okok, tob kɨlop okok pak pagel kasek kumel, dɨ lum ayaŋ lɨnɨgel agɨlak.
